v2.headline: Built 53+ startups generating $21M+ ARR. Helping founders scale ideas into viable AI products | Founder @Softaims | Access to top 5% engineering talent | Follow for SaaS Growth Tips.
v2.about:
Since 2015, I helped the founders build and scale 53+ startups with a combined valuation of $138m.
 
My goal for 2024 is to help 20 entrepreneurs build their SaaS products and scale them using our proven outreach systems.

Here’s my story:

In 2013, I made my first business move by purchasing a Facebook page dedicated to Japanese swords. To be honest, I was broke at the time and bought it for $560. 

The real question is, where did I get the money? 

My father had sent it for my university fees while I was studying software engineering. Despite being afraid, I took the risk and invested in buying the page.

That turned out to be one of my best decisions. I sold over 250 swords through that page, generating over $17k, until Facebook changed its rules and the page got suspended.

After that, I started various small businesses like a bedding e-commerce store and selling mobile covers on Amazon. Some made me a few bucks, and some failed.

The end of 2014 was a turning point. My friend Umair, who was freelancing as a software engineer, referred a client to me on a partnership basis. 

That’s when I decided to build Softaims to help founders build and scale their SaaS startups.

From 2015 to 2024, here are the results:

➣ Built 53+ SaaS Products
➣ Valuation $138M+
➣ Helped all our clients grow through marketing and sales.
➣ Built my own startup, Softaims
➣ Accessed 200+ top engineering teams

〽️ "M. Umar and his team did an exceptional job building my platform, Hello Median. Thanks to their expertise, its valuation has now reached $250k."

At Softaims, we’ve developed solutions for a wide range of industries, including healthcare, finance, e-commerce, education, real estate, hospitality, Marketing & Media, telecommunications, entertainment, and more.

I regularly post tips on:

➣ Build SaaS From Scratch
➣ Growth Marketing
➣ Personal Branding

Want to learn more?

P.S. Let’s have a 1:1 call so we can chat about scaling your SaaS.
